channel.title: Cw scoreboard to a update list

item.title: Cw scoreboard to a update list
item.dc:creator: @wazup wazup
item.description:
@wazup wrote:

Ok at cw at the portals there is a scoreboard if u right click on it the number is 4484 i gues that the id… and coords 2437,3093… anyways u view it and nutin happens i want it to open a menu

i made a menu public void UpdateMenu() and i made the command

[code] else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“updates”))
{

	UpdateMenu();	
}[/code]the menu works fine opening it as a command.. using them how can i view the scoreboard and it opens up my menu i tried something it didnt work

thankyou

Read full topic
